014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.Constable;
017import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
018import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
019
020import java.util.Collections;
021
022import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
023import java.util.function.BiFunction;
024import java.util.function.BinaryOperator;
025import java.util.function.Function;
026import java.util.function.Supplier;
027
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.Collection;
030import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.Map.Entry;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.SequencedSet;
036import java.util.Set;
037
038import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
039import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
040
041import java.util.stream.Collector;
042import java.util.stream.Collector.Characteristics;
043
044import org.microbean.bean.Alternate.Resolver;
045
046import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
047
048import org.microbean.lang.TypeAndElementSource;
049
050import static java.lang.Integer.signum;
051
052import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
053import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
054import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
055
056import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSequencedSet;
057
058import static java.util.function.Predicate.not;
059
060import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Assignability;
061import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_DefaultBeanSet;
062import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Resolver;
063import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.anyAndDefaultQualifiers;
064import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.defaultQualifiers;
065import static org.microbean.bean.Ranked.DEFAULT_RANK;
066
067import static org.microbean.scope.Scope.SINGLETON_ID;
068
069/**
070 * A straightforward {@link BeanSet} implementation.
071 *
072 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson/" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
073 */
074// Experimenting with making this non-final so the no-arg constructor can supply its own beans via some other
075// mechanism. Think ldc.
076public class DefaultBeanSet implements BeanSet, Constable {
077
078
079  /*
080   * Instance fields.
081   */
082
083
084  private final Resolver resolver;
085
086  private final Assignability assignability;
087
088  private final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beansView;
089
090  // A cache of Beans that were selected by a BeanSelectionCriteria
091  private final ConcurrentMap<BeanSelectionCriteria, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> selectionCache;
092
093  // Guaranteed to be a submap of selectionCache.
094  private final ConcurrentMap<BeanSelectionCriteria, Bean<?>> resolutionCache;
095
096
097  /*
098   * Constructors.
099   */
100
101
102  /**
103   * Creates a new, essentially useless, {@link DefaultBeanSet}.
104   *
105   * <p>Using this constructor will result in a {@link DefaultBeanSet} that contains only self-referential {@link
106   * Bean}s. It is probably useful only for proxying purposes.</p>
107   *
108   * @see #DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)
109   *
110   * @deprecated This constructor is for very specialized use cases only. Please use one of the other constructors
111   * instead.
112   */
113  @Deprecated
114  public DefaultBeanSet() {
115    this(new Assignability(), List.of(), Map.of(), StockResolver.INSTANCE);
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Creates a new {@link DefaultBeanSet}.
120   *
121   * @param beans a {@link Collection} of {@link Bean}s; may be {@code null}; no reference to this object is
122   * retained
123   *
124   * @see #DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)
125   */
126  public DefaultBeanSet(final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
127    this(new Assignability(), beans, Map.of(), StockResolver.INSTANCE);
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Creates a new {@link DefaultBeanSet}.
132   *
133   * @param assignability an {@link Assignability}; may be {@code null} in which case a default one will be used
134   *
135   * @param beans a {@link Collection} of {@link Bean}s; may be {@code null}; no reference to this object is
136   * retained
137   *
138   * @see #DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)
139   */
140  public DefaultBeanSet(final Assignability assignability, final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
141    this(assignability, beans, Map.of(), StockResolver.INSTANCE);
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Creates a new {@link DefaultBeanSet}.
146   *
147   * @param assignability an {@link Assignability}; may be {@code null} in which case a default one will be used
148   *
149   * @param beans a {@link Collection} of {@link Bean}s; may be {@code null}; no reference to this object is
150   * retained
151   *
152   * @param preCalculatedResolutions a {@link Map} of {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} to {@link Bean}s representing
153   * already-resolved {@link Bean}s; may be {@code null}; no reference to this object is retained
154   *
155   * @param resolver a {@link Resolver}; may be {@code null} in which case a default one will be used
156   *
157   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code preCalculatedResolutions} contains any {@link BeanSelectionCriteria}
158   * that does not {@linkplain BeanSelectionCriteria#selects(Bean) select its corresponding <code>Bean</code>}
159   */
160  @SuppressWarnings("this-escape")
161  public DefaultBeanSet(final Assignability assignability,
162                        Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans,
163                        Map<? extends BeanSelectionCriteria, ? extends Bean<?>> preCalculatedResolutions,
164                        final Resolver resolver) {
165    super();
166    this.assignability = assignability == null ? new Assignability() : assignability;
167    this.resolver = resolver == null ? StockResolver.INSTANCE : resolver;
168    this.resolutionCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
169    this.selectionCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
170
171    if (beans == null) {
172      beans = List.of();
173    }
174    if (preCalculatedResolutions == null) {
175      preCalculatedResolutions = Map.of();
176    }
177    final List<Bean<?>> newBeans = new ArrayList<>(beans.size() + 4 + preCalculatedResolutions.size());
178    newBeans.addAll(beans);
179    for (final Entry<? extends BeanSelectionCriteria, ? extends Bean<?>> e : preCalculatedResolutions.entrySet()) {
180      final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc = e.getKey();
181      final Bean<?> b = e.getValue();
182      if (!bsc.selects(b)) {
183        throw new IllegalArgumentException("preCalculatedResolutions; beanSelectionCriteria (" + bsc + ") does not select bean (" + b + ")");
184      }
185      newBeans.add(b);
186      this.resolutionCache.put(bsc, b);
187    }
188    newBeans.add(this.resolverBean());
189    newBeans.add(this.bean());
190    newBeans.add(this.assignabilityBean());
191    newBeans.add(this.typeAndElementSourceBean());
192    Collections.sort(newBeans, DefaultBeanSet::compareRanks);
193    // Second pass to efficiently prime the selection cache now that validation has happened.
194    for (final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc : preCalculatedResolutions.keySet()) {
195      this.beans(bsc, newBeans);
196    }
197    this.beansView = unmodifiableSequencedSet(new LinkedHashSet<>(newBeans));
198
199    // Prime the selection and resolution caches with our beans.
200    final TypeAndElementSource tes = assignability.typeAndElementSource();
201    this.bean(new BeanSelectionCriteria(assignability, tes.declaredType(Resolver.class), defaultQualifiers(), true), DefaultBeanSet::returnNull);
202    this.bean(new BeanSelectionCriteria(assignability, tes.declaredType(BeanSet.class), defaultQualifiers(), true), DefaultBeanSet::returnNull);
203    this.bean(new BeanSelectionCriteria(assignability, tes.declaredType(Assignability.class), defaultQualifiers(), true), DefaultBeanSet::returnNull);
204    this.bean(new BeanSelectionCriteria(assignability, tes.declaredType(TypeAndElementSource.class), defaultQualifiers(), true), DefaultBeanSet::returnNull);
205  }
206
207
208  /*
209   * Instance methods.
210   */
211
212
213  @Override // BeanSet
214  public final Bean<?> bean(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
215    return this.bean(beanSelectionCriteria, Resolver::fail);
216  }
217
218  @Override // BeanSet
219  public final Bean<?> bean(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria,
220                            final BiFunction<? super BeanSelectionCriteria, ? super Collection<? extends Bean<?>>, ? extends Bean<?>> op) {
221    return this.resolutionCache.computeIfAbsent(beanSelectionCriteria, s -> this.resolver.resolve(s, this.beans(s), op));
222  }
223
224  @Override // BeanSet
225  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans() {
226    return this.beansView;
227  }
228
229  @Override // BeanSet
230  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
231    return this.beans(beanSelectionCriteria, this.beansView);
232  }
233
234  private final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria,
235                                            final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
236    return
237      this.selectionCache.computeIfAbsent(beanSelectionCriteria,
238                                          bsc -> beans.stream().filter(bsc::selects).collect(new BeanCollector()));
239  }
240
241  @Override // Constable
242  public Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<DefaultBeanSet>> describeConstable() {
243    return this.assignability.describeConstable()
244      .flatMap(aDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.beansView)
245               .flatMap(beansDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.resolutionCache)
246                        .flatMap(pcrDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.resolver)
247                                 .map(resolverDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
248                                                                             MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_DefaultBeanSet,
249                                                                                                            CD_Assignability,
250                                                                                                            CD_Collection,
251                                                                                                            CD_Map,
252                                                                                                            CD_Resolver),
253                                                                             aDesc,
254                                                                             beansDesc,
255                                                                             pcrDesc,
256                                                                             resolverDesc)))));
257  }
258
259  /*
260   * Reporting- and snapshot-oriented methods.
261   */
262
263  public final Set<BeanSelectionCriteria> beanSelectionCriterias() {
264    return this.selectionCache.keySet();
265  }
266
267  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> resolvedBeans() {
268    return this.resolutionCache.values().stream().collect(new BeanCollector());
269  }
270
271  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> selectedBeans() {
272    return this.selectionCache.values().stream().flatMap(Set::stream).collect(new BeanCollector());
273  }
274
275  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> unselectedBeans() {
276    final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> selectedBeans = this.selectedBeans();
277    return this.beans().stream().filter(not(selectedBeans::contains)).collect(new BeanCollector());
278  }
279
280  /*
281   * Methods returning Beans for foundational constructs in this class.
282   */
283
284  private final Bean<DefaultBeanSet> bean() {
285    final TypeAndElementSource tes = this.assignability.typeAndElementSource();
286    return
287      new Bean<>(new Id(new BeanTypeList(List.of(tes.declaredType(DefaultBeanSet.class),
288                                                 tes.declaredType(BeanSet.class))),
289                        anyAndDefaultQualifiers(),
290                        SINGLETON_ID,
291                        DEFAULT_RANK - 100),
292                 new Singleton<>(this));
293  }
294
295  private final Bean<Resolver> resolverBean() {
296    final TypeAndElementSource tes = this.assignability.typeAndElementSource();
297    return
298      new Bean<>(new Id(new BeanTypeList(List.of(tes.declaredType(null, tes.typeElement(Resolver.class)))),
299                        anyAndDefaultQualifiers(),
300                        SINGLETON_ID,
301                        DEFAULT_RANK),
302                 new Singleton<>(this.resolver));
303  }
304
305  private final Bean<Assignability> assignabilityBean() {
306    final TypeAndElementSource tes = this.assignability.typeAndElementSource();
307    return
308      new Bean<>(new Id(new BeanTypeList(List.of(tes.declaredType(null, tes.typeElement(Assignability.class)))),
309                        anyAndDefaultQualifiers(),
310                        SINGLETON_ID,
311                        DEFAULT_RANK),
312                 new Singleton<>(this.assignability));
313  }
314
315  private final Bean<TypeAndElementSource> typeAndElementSourceBean() {
316    final TypeAndElementSource tes = this.assignability.typeAndElementSource();
317    return
318      new Bean<>(new Id(new BeanTypeList(List.of(tes.declaredType(null, tes.typeElement(tes.getClass())),
319                                                 tes.declaredType(null, tes.typeElement(TypeAndElementSource.class)))),
320                        anyAndDefaultQualifiers(),
321                        SINGLETON_ID,
322                        DEFAULT_RANK),
323                 new Singleton<>(tes));
324  }
325
326
327  /*
328   * Static methods.
329   */
330
331
332  private static final int compareRanks(final Ranked b0, final Ranked b1) {
333    return signum(b0.rank() - b1.rank());
334  }
335
336  private static final Bean<?> returnNull(final BeanSelectionCriteria x, final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> xx) {
337    return null;
338  }
339
340
341  /*
342   * Inner and nested classes.
343   */
344
345
346  private static final class StockResolver implements Constable, Resolver {
347
348    private static final Resolver INSTANCE = new StockResolver();
349
350    private StockResolver() {
351      super();
352    }
353
354    @Override // Constable
355    public final Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<StockResolver>> describeConstable() {
356      return Optional.empty();
357    }
358
359  }
360
361  private static final class BeanCollector implements Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> {
362
363    private BeanCollector() {
364      super();
365    }
366
367    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
368    public final BiConsumer<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, Bean<?>> accumulator() {
369      return LinkedHashSet::add;
370    }
371
372    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
373    public final Set<Characteristics> characteristics() {
374      return Set.of();
375    }
376
377    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
378    public final BinaryOperator<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>> combiner() {
379      return BeanCollector::merge;
380    }
381
382    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
383    public final Function<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> finisher() {
384      return Collections::unmodifiableSequencedSet;
385    }
386
387    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
388    public final Supplier<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>> supplier() {
389      return LinkedHashSet::new;
390    }
391
392    private static final <T, S extends Collection<T>> S merge(final S s0, final S s1) {
393      s0.addAll(s1);
394      return s0;
395    }
396
397
398  }
399
400}
